primary.request: Make a maintenance payment over the phone
primary.context: Caller refused the automated link delivery and insisted on speaking to someone to pay
primary.detail: The caller requested to pay over the phone and was transferred to a queue where they waited for over 25 minutes before disconnecting.

steps: Caller requested to make a maintenance payment.
AI offered to send a payment link via text or email.
Caller refused the link and requested to pay over the phone.
AI transferred the caller to the concierge queue.
Caller waited in the queue for approximately 28 minutes, eventually speaking over hold music/messages before hanging up.

impediment.detail: The caller was stuck in a transfer queue for over 25 minutes without reaching a human agent.

corrections.note: Caller corrected AI's offer of a link, requesting phone payment.

actions.detail: Transfer to concierge initiated per customer request.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to make a maintenance payment but specifically requested to do so over the phone rather than via the AI's link. They were transferred to a queue and abandoned after a 28-minute wait.
insights.verbatim: No. On the phone. I'm gonna call and make it over the phone payment.
insights.coaching: The agent correctly identified that phone payments are out of scope and transferred the caller; the failure was operational (queue wait time) rather than a logic error by the AI.
